Document.TEXT: Colour: Blue Body Style: Hatchback Description: Insurance Group 7, Franchise Approved, RDS With PTY And EON Settings,Driver & Passenger Air Bags, ABS Electronically Controlled With Brake Assist System,15 inch 5-Spoke Alloy Wheels With Locking Wheelnuts,Air Conditioning & Air Recirculation Function Manual,Passenger Airbag Cut Off Switch,Bluetooth,Power Assisted Steering - Speed Sensitive,Single Disc CD Player, WMA / MP3 Reader,Central Double Locking With Remote Activation,Green Tinted Glass,Driver Knee Airbags,Side Curtain Airbags,Front Side Airbags,Child Seat Fixings - ISO-FIX Outer Rear Seats,Transponder Key Engine Immobiliser,Trip Computer,Electrically Adjustable Exterior Mirrors,Front Wipers Twin Speed And Fixed Intermittent,AM / FM Radio With Preset Settings,Front Electric Windows,Colour Coded Mirrors,Front And Rear Colour Keyed Bumpers,Ad Steering Column/Wheel - Tilt And Telescopic Adjustment,Rear Wiper Intermittent Sweep,60/40 Split Fold Rear Seat Back,Rear Screen - Heated,Audio Control Steering Wheel Mounted,Driver Seat Height Adjustment Manual,Cupholders Front X 2 & Rear X 1,Outside Temperature Display,Space Saver Spare Wheel,High Mounted Stop Lamp,Headrests Front And 3 Rear Height Adjustable,Upholstery Cloth,Bottle Holders,Side Impact Beams On All Side Doors,Seatbelt Front Electronic Sensors Pre-Tensioner,Interior Tailgate Pull Handle,Roof Mounted Radio Aerial,Front Disc Brakes Ventilated, Rear Drum Brakes,Vanity Mirrors - Driver And Passenger With Cover,Analogue Odometer,Engine Management Warning,Digital Clock,Vehicle Parts Marking - Major Parts Traceable To VIN,Low Fuel, Water Temperature And Lights On Indicators,Remote Release Fuel Cap And Location Indicator,Emergency Locking Retractors Seatbelts Outer ELR & ALR,Front Map And Room Lamp And Load Area Lamp,Door Inserts - Cloth And Gear Knob - Leather,Fully Trimmed Boot,Electronic Brake Force Distribution,Cloth interior
